game_description: For ages 13 and up. EMERGENCY MEETING: Weâ€™ve arrived at Polus Point! Experience the new map in all its chilly, yet hot glory with brand-new tasks, rooms, layout, kill and eject animations, and much more! Weâ€™re also fired up to announce our first Among Us VR-exclusive hat releases â€” â€˜FREEzing Polus Pointâ€™ Hats (5 FREE hats) and Hat Pack: Polus Point Picks (5-hat DLC). Youâ€™re going to lava it, beans! Among Us VR is a party game of teamwork and betrayal. Grab your crew and headset and launch into the VR version of this hit multiplayer deduction game. Play with 4 - 10 players as you complete tasks to hold your ship together. But beware! One or more random players among the crew are Impostors bent on sabotaging and killing everyone. Features â— Gameplay: Experience the core Among Us gameplay you know and love, such as tasks, sabotages, emergency meetings, and venting, but now in VR â— Chat: Communicate using in-game voice chat (featuring proximity chat) or quick text chat â— Minigames: Play old favorites and new-for-VR games â— Customization: Pick your characterâ€™s color and hat; the new Hat Pack: Crew Favorites is available for purchase now â— Comfort and Safety: Adjust your settings to have the best experience possible â— Cross-Platform in VR: Play with other VR users, even on other VR platforms and headsets â— Locomotion: Choose single or two-handed options â— Custom Lobby Settings: 18 settings to customize the game Join our Discord!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Venezuela)
Developer: Schell Games, Innersloth LLC, and Robot Teddy
